title: F/S - Lots of lower grade stuff - Coupons, Strips, etc.
author: CobbSpikedMe

posts.post_title: F/S - Lots of lower grade stuff - Coupons, Strips, etc.
posts.post_content:
I have a bunch of low grade stuff for sale.  Please check out the album linked below to see pics and prices.

Prices are postpaid.  First to email me stating "I will take it" will get the card(s) they want.  I'd prefer PayPal, but will happily take a check or money order.

I just got a new computer and my scanner is not working right now, so if there isn't a back scan then I won't be able to get one for you.  These cards are all low grade though, so not having a back scan on a poor condition strip card shouldn't be a big deal anyway.

Please be patient when waiting for a response, but know that I will respond to all inquiries.

[url]http://picasaweb.google.com/andyhuntoon/BST?feat=directlink[/url]

Thank you very much,

AndyH
[url]andyhuntoon@gmail.com[/url]

Bump 

Several cards still available.  Thanks for looking.

AndyH :)
